resources.string: Mike Banning is framed for the attempted assassination of the President and must evade his own agency and the FBI as he tries to uncover the real threat. After the events in the previous movies , secret service agent Mike Banning is framed for the attempted assassination of the US president Alan Turnbull , using all his strength , and skill. Mike Banning must locate the real threat that lurking and uncovering the deep political connections and ties to the whitehouse.
